# apollostudio_me (Data Source)

Provides details about the current authenticated user

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "apollostudio_me" "current" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the user
- `name` (String) Name of the user
